div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2099 Caltanissetta, 1948 Burial: c. 400 B.C. (K) Contents: 6+ AR Acragas: 1 tetradr. (with Scylla) didr. Camarina: 1 tetradr. (cf. SNGLloyd 868) Catana Gela: 1 tetradr. (as Jenkins 483) Said to be similar to the Milazzo hd. (see no. 2098 above) Disposition: dispersed Note in BM
